Question
========

Given the following numbers in a sample: 8, 5, 2, 8, 4, 9. The 95% confidence interval for the mean of the population from which the sample was drawn is:

Answerlist
----------

* <3.73; 8.27 >
* <3.49; 8.51 >
* <3.25; 8.75 >
* <3.11; 8.89 >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* <3.73; 8.27 >: Incorrect
* <3.49; 8.51 >: Incorrect
* <3.25; 8.75 >: Incorrect
* <3.11; 8.89 >: Correct
